snippet: The instruments on the robotic vehicle that will depart for the Red Planet in 2020 will include a device for making oxygen out of carbon dioxide.
abstract: NASA announces plans to make oxygen, key ingredient of rocket fuel, on Mars in the coming decade.
lead_paragraph: The instruments on the robotic vehicle that will depart for the Red Planet in 2020 will include a device for making oxygen out of carbon dioxide.

headline.main: NASA to Test Making Oxygen, Key to Rocket Fuel, on Mars
headline.print_headline: NASA to Test Making Oxygen, Key to Rocket Fuel, on Mars
